Title: Prohibits bad faith assertions of patent infringement
Summary: Prohibits bad faith assertions of patent infringement where the person making the assertion is not engaging, has not engaged or attempted to engage, or does not intend to engage in the bona fide use of the patent in the production, development, licensing or commercialization of goods or services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting bad faith assertions of patent infringement
